thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: zoubair ghazi

author: zoubair ghazi
title: zoubair ghazi
text: I rented a car. Picture shows impala chevy new. They gave me camry 2010. Not safe to drive with very old tires. I went to the hotel to check in. I cane back to the car, and i found cockroaches. The car was supplied by Economy A1 Rentacar hawaii. They didn't want to return my car with no charge. Also, they wanted to charge for the whole week, even if i returned the car in 30 min.
